en.title: Help

helpItems.title: What Bible translations are used across BiOY?
helpItems.shortAnswer: BiOY uses the New International Version (NIVUK), with some references to particular passages of Eugene Peterson’s The Message.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: BiOY uses New International Version (NIVUK), with some references to particular passages of Eugene Peterson’s The Message.

helpItems.title: How can I change my Edition?
helpItems.shortAnswer: If you would like to switch to a different Edition of the Bible In One Year plan you can find this in the Settings menu.
helpItems.detailedAnswer:
If you would like to switch to a different Edition of the Bible In One Year plan you can find this in settings.

Note: Other Editions are only available in English, so you need to set your content language to English, before you can change your edition. Tap Edition and select either Classic, Express or Youth, any content you have already completed will be downloaded again in this new edition format and your progress through the year will be saved.

helpItems.title: What is the structure of a day’s content?
helpItems.shortAnswer: Each day consists of the theme of the day, a wisdom passage (Psalm or Proverb), passages from the new and the old testament. After each reading Nicky provides a commentary and prayer reflection.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: Each day consists of an Introduction, presenting the theme of the day.  This is followed by a wisdom passage (Psalm or Proverb) and a commentary on that passage by Nicky.  There are the passages and the New and Old Testament each with a commentary.  The day completes with a thought from Pippa.  In the Express these sections are shorter and only reference small passages or verses.  The Express and Youth both contain a verse of the day and thought of the day.  Youth in addition features an Action of the Day.

helpItems.title: I’m not able to play the audio, what should I do?
helpItems.shortAnswer: Ensure you are using the latest version of the app, then try switching editions and then return again to your preferred edition.
helpItems.detailedAnswer:
**Please update your app to the latest version of Bible in One Year. If you have done so and are still unable to play today’s audio, please try switching editions and then return again to your preferred edition.**

Click on Settings and then Edition and select a different edition.

For example: Classic > Youth > Classic, or Express > Classic > Express.

If this also fails, please email us at [bioy@alpha.org](mailto:bioy@alpha.org "mailto\:bioy@alpha.org").

helpItems.title: How long are audio files stored on my phone?
helpItems.shortAnswer: Files that have been automatically downloaded are automatically deleted after you have listened to them. If you have manually downloaded audio tracks, these need to be deleted manually.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: Files that have been automatically downloaded are automatically deleted after you have listened to them. If you have manually downloaded audio tracks, these need to be deleted manually.

helpItems.title: What additional functionality can I expect over the coming weeks?
helpItems.detailedAnswer:
1. ✅  An option to switch to dark mode to preserve energy, or for users who prefer reading screens in dark mode - Now live! - Update your app to use.
2. ✅  Audio update – including the option to download the audio, adjust the speed of the audio and track your audio process - Now live! - Update your app to use.
3. Tracking Progress to see how much reading/ overall readings you have progressed through
4. ✅  Ability to share a day’s reading.

Thereafter we will be working on several ideas and improvements for the app which you are welcome to feed in to by emailing: [bioy@alpha.org](mailto:bioy@alpha.org)
helpItems.shortAnswer: Dark mode, auto downloads of audio commentary, progress tracking, content sharing.

helpItems.title: How do I manually delete audio files that are saved to my device?
helpItems.shortAnswer: Swipe right on the relevant day from the list view and tap the bin icon.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: Swipe right on the relevant day from the list view and tap the bin icon. To see a list of all your downloaded audio, go to Settings by clicking the cog in the bottom left corner. Select Manage Audio, and tick which days you would like to delete or select all. Click the button at the bottom of your screen to delete the selected days' audios.

helpItems.title: How do I stop my device auto-downloading audio files?
helpItems.shortAnswer: Auto downloads can be managed in Settings, under the the ‘Audio Downloads’ section.
helpItems.detailedAnswer:
Auto downloads can be managed in Settings, in the ‘Audio Downloads’ section.

Please note that turning Auto Downloads off won’t automatically delete any audio that has been downloaded already. Audio files stored on your phone can be deleted under ‘Settings’, in ‘Manage Audio’.

helpItems.title: Can I listen to audio offline?
helpItems.detailedAnswer:
As long as you have the latest version of the app, you can do this in one of two ways.

1. You can set up auto downloads, which will allow your phone to download the next day’s audio content automatically and keep it until you have listened to it. Go to Settings, Audio Downloads, and choose how many days audio you would like your app to download for you.

2. Alternatively you can also manually download audio files, by swiping right on the day from the list view. This brings up a download button on the left, simply tap it to download the file.

If you are concerned about downloading over your mobile data, please ensure ‘Use mobile data’ is set to ‘Off’ on your device.
helpItems.shortAnswer: There are two ways of listening to audio offline.

helpItems.title: How can I find out how many days audio are stored on my phone?
helpItems.shortAnswer: In the settings you can see how many audio files are downloaded under 'manage audio'
helpItems.detailedAnswer: Navigate to ’Settings’ by swiping from left to right and clicking the hamburger (3 lines) icon at the bottom left of your screen. When you have selected ‘Settings’ will see a summary of the number of downloaded audios under ‘Manage Audio’. Tapping that will allow you to delete those you select from your device (but they can be re-downloaded again if you need).

helpItems.title: What happens to my audio files if I change edition?
helpItems.shortAnswer: Audio files are deleted if you change which edition your device is accessing. You can still download the audio files manually by swiping right on the day from the list view and tapping the download icon.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: Audio files are deleted if you change which edition your device is accessing. You can still download the audio files manually by swiping right on the day from the list view and tapping the download icon.

helpItems.title: If I delete an audio file, can I ever get it back?
helpItems.shortAnswer: You can download audio files at any time manually by swiping right on the day from the list view and clicking the download icon that appears.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: You can download audio files at any time manually by swiping right on the day from the list view and clicking the download icon that appears.

helpItems.title: Do I have to download an audio file to listen to it?
helpItems.shortAnswer: No, you can stream the audio over Wi-Fi or using data if you prefer.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: No, you can stream the audio over wifi or using data if you prefer.

helpItems.title: How can I skip through different sections of the audio?
helpItems.shortAnswer: For Classic and Express editions of BiOY, the skip function on the audio player cycles through each section of the audio.
helpItems.detailedAnswer:
For Classic and Express editions of BiOY, the skip function on the audio player cycles through each section of the audio in this order: Intro, Proverbs/Psalm bible, Proverbs/Psalm Commentary, New Testament Bible, New Testament Commentary, Old Testament Bible, Old Testament Commentary, Pippa Adds. Additionally there is an option to skip 15 seconds forward or backwards through the audio. If you have no option to skip 15 seconds, please download the latest version of your app for this feature.

There is currently no option to skip through sections on the Youth edition.

helpItems.title: Can I receive BiOY via email?
helpItems.shortAnswer: Yes! You can sign up to receive the BiOY Classic commentary from the homepage
helpItems.detailedAnswer: Yes. If you would like to receive the BiOY Classic commentary by email, or if you have stopped receiving the daily BiOY emails and would like to re-subscribe, you can [sign up or re-subscribe here](https://landing.mailerlite.com/webforms/landing/p5d3p8).

helpItems.title: What languages is BiOY available in?
helpItems.shortAnswer: Currently, the classic edition of BiOY is available is Arabic, English, Chinese, Hindi and Spanish. Audio is currently only available in English, with Chinese and Hindi to follow.
helpItems.detailedAnswer:
Currently, the classic edition of BiOY is available is Arabic, English, Chinese, Hindi and Spanish. Audio is currently only available in English, with Chinese and Hindi to follow.

We will continue to work with other existing translations to make them available through the app – look out for Bahasa Indonesia, Dutch, German, French, Thai and Finnish launching through 2021 and 2022.

helpItems.title: How do I access the new app Menu?
helpItems.shortAnswer: Swipe right from the left of your screen. This gives you access to selecting which day you would like to read or listen to.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: Swipe right from the left of your screen. This gives you access to selecting which day you would like to read or listen to. Clicking the hamburger icon in the bottom left hand corner will bring up settings. Here you can change which edition you are accessing, which language the content is in, and the app language.

helpItems.title: Can I change the start date?
helpItems.shortAnswer: If you would like to change the date you selected to start the BiOY reading plan you will need to either reset you app data or re-install the app
helpItems.detailedAnswer: If you would like to change the date you selected to start the BiOY reading plan you will need to uninstall the app and install it again from the App Store or Google Play. When you launch the app again for the first time, select the edition you wish to use (Classic, Express, Youth) and it will ask you which day you wish to start from.

helpItems.title: Why have you updated the app?
helpItems.shortAnswer: We needed to move the app to a new platform to enable us to add more functionality and quality-of-life improvements that were not possible in the legacy BiOY app. Simply put, in order to improve the app, we had to rebuild it from the bottom up.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: We needed to move the app to a new platform to enable us to add more functionality and quality-of-life improvements that were not possible in the legacy BiOY app. Simply put, in order to improve the app, we had to rebuild it from the bottom up.

helpItems.title: How can I donate via the app?
helpItems.shortAnswer: Thank you for considering giving toward BiOY, you can donate through the app menu or here on the BiOY site - Click 'donate'.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: Thank you for considering giving toward BiOY, you can donate through the app menu or here on the [BiOY site](/en/donate).

helpItems.title: Does this really contain the whole bible?
helpItems.shortAnswer: Yes, the entire bible is covered in the BiOY, each day a you'll read part of the Old Testmant, a Psalm or Proverb, and part of the New Testament.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: Yes, the entire bible is covered in the BiOY, each day a you'll read part of the Old Testmant, a Psalm or Proverb, and part of the New Testament.

helpItems.title: I missed a day, can I change the day I am on?
helpItems.shortAnswer: If you would like to change which day’s BiOY commentary you are reading, for example if you missed a day and want to catch up, you can swipe right from the left hand side of the screen of your phone/tablet, and select a different day from the list.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: If you would like to change which day’s BiOY commentary you are reading, for example if you missed a day and want to catch up, you can swipe right from the left hand side of the screen of your phone/tablet, and select a different day from the list.

helpItems.title: Why can I not read ahead?
helpItems.shortAnswer: BiOY is updated daily to keep material fresh and relevant. You cannot read the current year’s Bible in One Year commentary ahead simply because it has not been written/uploaded yet.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: BiOY is updated daily to keep material fresh and relevant. You cannot read the current year’s Bible in One Year commentary ahead simply because it has not been written/uploaded yet.

helpItems.title: Can I change the day I am on?
helpItems.shortAnswer: If you would like to change the date you selected to start the BiOY reading plan you can swipe right from the left hand side of the screen of your phone/tablet, and select a different date from the list.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: If you would like to change the date you selected to start the BiOY reading plan you can swipe right from the left hand side of the screen of your phone/tablet, and select a different date from the list.

helpItems.title: What Editions are available?
helpItems.shortAnswer: In addition to the BiOY Classic edition (which takes around 25 minutes) there is also an option to do an Express edition (which takes 10-12 minutes) or the Youth edition (which is co-hosted by Toby Stokes, a member of the HTB Youth team).
helpItems.detailedAnswer: In addition to the BiOY Classic edition (which takes around 25 minutes) there is also an option to do an Express edition (which takes 10-12 minutes) or the Youth edition (which is co-hosted by Toby Stokes, a member of the HTB Youth team).

helpItems.title: Whose voices am I hearing in the audio tracks?
helpItems.shortAnswer: Bible readings have been provided by David Suchet. Other voices that you might hear include Nicky and Pippa Gumbel and Toby Stokes, a part of the Youth Alpha team.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: Bible readings have been provided by David Suchet. Other voices that you might hear include Nicky and Pippa Gumbel and Toby Stokes, a part of the Youth Alpha team.

helpItems.title: Can I synchronise the BiOY app between my phone and tablet?
helpItems.shortAnswer: Not yet. There is currently no way to sync your progress through BiOY, although this is a feature that is being considered for 2021.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: Not yet. There is currently no way to sync your progress through BiOY, although this is a feature that is being considered for 2021.

helpItems.title: Will the BiOY automatically reset after I complete Day 365?
helpItems.shortAnswer: For those that are a few weeks behind and are worried they’ll lose access to the commentaries, be assured that you need to complete all of the days before the app resets back to Day 1.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: For those that are a few weeks behind and are worried they’ll lose access to the commentaries, be assured that you need to complete all of the days before the app resets back to Day 1.

helpItems.title: Is it the commentary the same every year?
helpItems.shortAnswer: The majority of the content will be the same with small updates each year.
helpItems.detailedAnswer: The majority of the content will be the same with small updates each year.
